workshoptitle: DBA Essentials - Manage storage structures for Oracle Database 23ai

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Initialize environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: View the storage structures
tutorials.description: How to view the storage structures in your Oracle Database using Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: View and multiplex online redo log file information
tutorials.description: How to view and multiplex Online Redo Log File information in your Oracle Database using Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Manage tablespaces
tutorials.description: How to view the tablespaces and create a new tablespace in your Oracle Database using Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Manage undo data
tutorials.description: How to view and manage the undo tablespace in your Oracle Database using Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control.

tutorials.title: Need help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to common problems and directions for receiving live help
